lead_paragraph: The Los Angeles Dodgers agreed to terms with the Japanese right-hander Kenta Maeda, according to multiple reports.

headline.print_headline: Dodgers Sign a Top Japanese Pitcher
headline.main: Dodgers Sign a Top Japanese Pitcher

snippet: The Los Angeles Dodgers agreed to terms with the Japanese right-hander Kenta Maeda, according to multiple reports.
abstract: Los Angeles Dodgers reportedly sign star Japanese pitcher Kenta Maeda.
